text:
Announcement: For those who are testing the beta3 of the new drivers for web development in harbour
              a new version (beta_4) was uploaded to <https://www.mod-harbour.com>
Changes: WIN32 and Linux versions are included in addition to the traditional WIN64
          The names of the binaries have changed.
          Also the environment variables in apache conf file.
          New error handler that shows the correct line numbers when there are includes and defines.
          Enjoy!
Coming soon: hw_apache binaries for MAC OSX
             win / linux binaries for NGINX
Enjoy!
